name: TOWN OF JOHNSTON v. LOCAL 1950 INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FIREFIGHTERS AFL-CIO
name_abbreviation: Town of Johnston v. Local 1950 International Ass'n of Firefighters

parties: TOWN OF JOHNSTON v. LOCAL 1950 INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FIREFIGHTERS AFL-CIO.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petitioner’s motion for stay of arbitration proceedings pending a decision on the petition for certiorari is granted.
DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Richard C. Tallo, Town Sol., Johnston, for petitioner.
Hawkins & Hoopis, Harry J. Hoopis, John P. Hawkins, Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
TOWN OF JOHNSTON v. LOCAL 1950 INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF FIREFIGHTERS AFL-CIO.
No. 80-306-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
July 10, 1980.
Richard C. Tallo, Town Sol., Johnston, for petitioner.
Hawkins & Hoopis, Harry J. Hoopis, John P. Hawkins, Providence, for respondent.
